events.name: USC Trojans at Penn State Nittany Lions

notes.headline: Rose Bowl Game Pres. by Northwestern Mutual

headlines.description: Matt Boermeester kicked a 46-yard field goal as time expired, and No. 9 Southern California rallied from a 14-point deficit in the fourth quarter for a 52-49 victory over No. 5 Penn State.
headlines.shortLinkText: USC hits FG at gun, beats Penn State 52-49 in epic Rose Bowl

headlines.description: Baker Mayfield passed for 296 yards and two touchdowns, including one scoring pass to fellow Heisman Trophy finalist Dede Westbrook, and Oklahoma defeated No. 17 Auburn 35-19 in the Sugar Bowl.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mayfield leads Oklahoma to 35-19 Sugar Bowl win over Auburn

events.name: Western Michigan Broncos at Wisconsin Badgers

headlines.description: Wisconsin tight end Troy Fumagalli made a leaping 8-yard touchdown catch in the fourth quarter and the Badgers won 24-16 in the Cotton Bowl on Monday to deny Western Michigan an undefeated season

video.headline: Wisconsin wins Cotton Bowl to hand Western Michigan first loss

headlines.shortLinkText: Wisconsin wins Cotton Bowl 24-16, only Western Michigan loss

headlines.description: Austin Appleby threw for 222 yards and two touchdowns, helping No. 20 Florida end a two-game losing streak with a 30-3 rout of No. 21 Iowa in the Outback Bowl on Monday.

video.headline: Florida trounces Iowa to win Outback Bowl

headlines.shortLinkText: Appleby shines, No. 20 Florida beats Iowa in Outback Bowl
